channel.title: Helpful User Watch - June
channel.description: This thread will be used to share and discuss any potential candidate(s) for the "The Overall Most Helpful Members of the Month" section in the Mopar Monthly issue that will be published at the end of June. Notable points will be placed into the OP.

item.title: Helpful User Watch - June
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:2, topic:521008”]Going to go ahead and nominate Sk8rdude461.
He has a very large amount of helpful, although arguably not the most polite, posts in the help section.[/quote]

Hmm, some of his posts are very helpful but some of them do seem to just be very vague when pointing to the answer. Whether that’s because he’s trying to avoid spoonfeeding, or just answer as quick as possible, I’m not sure.

Here is an example of that, as the host may not have been necessarily “invalid” - no internet connection, lack of portforwarding, etc, are all other issues.
This is another thread which he replied to, and contained little help at all.

Read full topic
